bookTitle: Amy Tan's The Joy Luck Club
bookAuthors: Harold Bloom, Amy Tan, Henry W. Berg
Plot: Presents the most important 20th-century criticism on major works from The Odyssey through modern literature. The critical essays reflect a variety of schools of criticism. Contains critical biographies, notes on the contributing critics, a chronology of the author's life, and an index. Introductory essay by Harold Bloom.
